data.name: Lilith Odyssey Soundtrack: Destined for Space Madness
data.detailed_description:
The full soundtrack of Lilith Odyssey!

Includes
  • One bonus track not featured in the game ("Hit 'em Hard").
  • Soundtrack album-cover notes (some graphics, notes, and descriptions of the songs).
  • Standard and High-Quality Cuts of all songs.

Vocal Credits
IGG Galactic Anthem -- Jonathan Matthews
Algorhythm -- Peter Szekeres
Space Madness -- Fred Brown
Spaceship Cowboy -- Quona Hudson, Michael Wells
What’s Real -- Jessica Blaise Ward
Better Run -- Onur Cobanoglu
Orphan Boy -- Rap: IAmSoLoco, Backing: Yasmin Palmer
Saddern Eyes -- Them and They
Scud Buckets -- Kurt Audlo
Comet Dad -- Tyler Luecke
Dim Paradiso -- Michael Wells
Star Mall Concierge -- Lead: Matty Fammartino, Chorus: Kathryn Miller
Highway Hearts -- Abbe Lewis

Minimum:
  • Storage: 61 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 950 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: The Lilith Odyssey soundtrack contains some sexual language and some references to the consumption of alcohol and space drugs.
